chapters.title: Ravens
chapters.info: Joslyn Aybara, p. [5]—Mother of Perrin, Adora, Deselle, and Paetram and wife of Con. She is very pretty, in Egwene's view, who thinks her smile could make the Sun bide its head in defeat. See also Aybara, Adora; Aybara, Con; Aybara, Deselle; Aybara, Paetram; Aybara, Perrin.
